note.p: Poet. Daughter of Nathaniel Snell and Ann Oram Chauncy. Married John Marmaduke Teesdale in 1842. A neighbour of CD from 1875; lived at Downe Hall. Poems by M. T. was posthumously published by her children in 1888.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/855/92/19)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 November 2014)
letter from Emma Darwin to J. B. Innes, 24 December [1875]
